attributes.action: Hold MPs accountable for thier campaigns
attributes.additional_details: Leave campaign say 350 million to go to that NHS which would sway votes but actually have no intention of ever making it happen. Unfair on the public to make decisions based on lies
attributes.background: After the remain and leave campaigns were both awful, I'd like future campaigns to be ran on facts which the people who are running can back up. This would give the public a chance to make informed decisions. If facts were later proved wrong candidates should face consequences of this actions
